23.3. Modeling Feature Engineered Data 479
# load a single file as a numpy array
def load_file(filepath):
dataframe = read_csv(filepath, header=None, delim_whitespace=True)
return dataframe.values
Listing 23.1: Example of a function for loading a single ﬁle.
We can call this function to load the X and y ﬁles for a given train or test set group, given
the similarity in directory layout and ﬁlenames. The load dataset group() function below
